name: Flame to The Void
description:
GAMES INFOS:

You are Droppy, a little drop of water !

There are freaking fireballs coming from the sky and you have to avoid them (otherwise you are getting hit and trust me that hurts) !

To win the game, you have to be on the last standing platform ALIVE !

Your health is represented as water cups but everytime you get hit by a fireball, you lose health ! But fortunately for you, some water cups will fall from the sky totally randomly and by drinking them, it would restore you 1 HP ! But, there is better : the water bottle, that can restore all your health ! But, watch out, the water bottle is more rare.

This game has been made for the fifth edition of the 60 hours long Games Factory Jam. The themes were inception, water/fire, void and the constraint was black and white.

NOTES ON THE THEMES:

INCEPTION: /

WATER/FIRE: Droppy, the water cups and the water bottles/Fireballs falling from the sky.

VOID: The void is under all the platforms; if you fall into it, you die.

BLACK AND WHITE: All the colors used in this game are in the grey scale.

GAMES CONTROLS:

ARROW KEYS to move

SPACE BAR to jump or double jump

F11 for fullscreen mode

ESCAPE for windowed mode

GAME TIPS:

1) Don't put any attention on the fireballs falling around you but you have to put your attention to the ones that can potentially hit you.

2) Water cups and water bottles usually falls near fireballs craters but, watch out : some of them falls near spots fireballs can potentially hit you.

3) Avoid staying on platforms of the last row because if a fireball falls on it, you will fall into the void.

4) Try to stay on the sides because if a fireball hits you, you will be propelled against the screen limit and you won't fall into the void.
